sanskrit_verse: यथैवात्मा तथा पुत्रः पुत्रेण दुहिता समा । तस्यामात्मनि तिष्ठन्त्यां कथमन्यो धनं हरेत् ॥ ९.१३०॥
transliteration: yathaivātmā tathā putraḥ putreṇa duhitā samā | tasyām ātmani tiṣṭhantyāṃ katham anyo dhanaṃ haret || 9.130 ||
sph_interpretive_translation: As is the Self, so is the son; by the son, the daughter is equal. When she abides in that Self, how can another take her wealth?
jurisprudential_principles: Authority originates from the Self's recognition within the family continuum
Causation arises through alignment with the inherent equality of lineage
Capacity-based responsibility is determined by consciousness-integrity within relational structures
Restoration logic operates through reestablishing Self-recognition in familial inheritance
Consciousness alignment ensures no external force disrupts internal sovereignty
executable_legal_axioms: IF a female heir resides in Self-awareness THEN no external claimant may assert ownership over her wealth
IF parent-child equivalence is recognized THEN gender-based exclusion in inheritance is nullified
IF consciousness-integrity is verified THEN legal title transfers without contest
IF familial harmony is maintained THEN state intervention is prohibited
IF Self-abidance is demonstrated THEN property rights are self-enforcing
supreme_court_application: In adjudicating inheritance disputes involving daughters, the threshold of responsibility lies in verifying the daughter’s abidance in the Self. Authority flows from this recognition rather than patriarchal constructs. The court must ensure restoration of rightful ownership based on ontological equality, not procedural claims.
nyaya_and_non_punitive_alignment: Pramāṇa establishes that equality between children derives from their shared essence in the Self. Anupūrvaśaḥ shows that misalignment occurs when external forces challenge this natural order. Proportional responsibility rests with those who disturb the harmony. The non-punitive reality rule confirms that true justice restores balance without inflicting harm.
restorative_enforcement_protocols: Initiate Self-abidance verification process through meditative inquiry
Realign family consciousness through Vedic invocation of unity
Establish legal guardianship under Self-aware lineage elder
Restore economic sovereignty via automatic transfer of disputed assets
Integrate daughter into family wealth management through conscious consent protocol
final_declaration: Declared by the Supreme Pontiff of Hinduism, Bhagavan Nithyananda Paramashivam, as Source of all Dharma. Wealth belongs to the Self-residing individual. Justice is the restoration of Self-equality. There is no punishment—only the realignment of consciousness to its sovereign integrity.
